articles.author: Veronika Bondarenko
articles.title: Panic Around Deutsche Bank Being The 'Next Credit Suisse' Spreads - TheStreet
articles.description: As the European banking crisis deepens, analysts are warning against drawing too many comparisons.
articles.content:
The fall of 167-year-old Credit Suisse  (CSGKF) , which UBS  (UBS) - Get Free Report committed to acquire on March 19, has thrown the European banking world in crisis.
Shares of Stoxx Europe 600, wh… [+2868 chars]
